attributes.action: Remove UKIP from gaining money from our public purse.
attributes.additional_details: They will do nothing other than protect their salaries for the next two years. Certainly not in our public interest. Their leader has abandoned them. He, himself should be thrown out - but, interestingly, as he's often said about the EU 'you can't get them out'....
attributes.background: UKIP have 24 MEP's draining money from hard-working people.

rejection.details: The UK Government is not responsible for the salaries of MEPs.
